comment: They do realize that passion does not equal owning it ... right ? We all love SW and are passionate about it , but it is intellectual property and whoever owns it can do whatever the hell they want .

            :ARG1-of (r2 / request-confirmation-91))

            :ARG2 (a3 / and

                        :mod (ii2 / intellectual)
                        :domain (ii3 / it))
                  :op2 (c2 / capable-01

comment: The passion wouldn't necessarily be bad if they weren't so clueless about what Star Wars actually is . Like those so called superfans of Trek that attack the ' politics ' of Discovery because Martin-Green is the lead , don't know what Trek is . And it's the same bigots too .
